We use our own hardware and own IP Allocation and we colocate our own servers/hardware for our VPS Hosting Services.

We use SSD Drives along with RAID 10 for all our VPS Nodes.

Our VPS Nodes are at least Dual Xeon CPU with at least 2.7 Ghz Clock speed (Most of our new VPS Nodes have CPU clock speed of 3.3Ghz) and at least 144 GB RAM per VPS Node.

All our VPS Nodes are connected to Gigabit port and all our VPS are capped at 100Mbps with unmetered bandwidth.

Our VPS comes with Java as well as HTML 5 VNC
